plot.C

To test the KDE created with build.C, invoke 

        root -l plot.C

If successful, this should:

  1. compile and link jetdata.cpp
  2. create the figures
    • fig_pt_KDE.gif
    • fig_eta_KDE.gif
    • fig_phi_KDE.gif

These figures should be identical to the previous ones.
